data.title: The rise and rise of Wendi Deng
authors: John Lippman, Leslie Chang, Robert Frank in New York, Source: The Wall Street Journal
data.meta_description: When Rupert Murdoch started stepping out with a beautiful young Chinese woman, everyone wondered who she was. And even though they married in June last year, Wendi Deng has remained a mystery. Until now. John Lippman, Leslie Chang and Robert Frank in New York did a little checking and found that this is no homebody.
data.text:
When Rupert Murdoch started stepping out with a beautiful young Chinese woman, everyone wondered who she was. And even though they married in June last year, Wendi Deng has remained a mystery. Until now. John Lippman, Leslie Chang and Robert Frank in New York did a little checking and found that this is no homebody.

W hen News Corp officials gathered in Hong Kong's convention centre in March to unveil their latest Chinese internet investment, a tall woman in their midst handed out a business card that read simply: "News Corporation/Wendi Deng Murdoch."

Loading...
